idea-plugin.name: JavaNight Themes
idea-plugin.description:
JavaNight Themes are themes focused on comfort and visibility when writing code.

  • Dark themes: Perfect for coding at night or in low-light settings, providing a pleasant contrast that minimizes eye strain, helping maintain concentration for longer periods without discomfort.

Themes

  • JavaPastel Mate
  • JavaPastel Lux
  • JavaPastel Space
  • JavaPastel HighContrast
